dialogueLines.line: ? What? I thought he ran away here...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Hey there, you silly triangular head. Have you seen a boy?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Did you say "silly triangular head"!? You mean me!?
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Yeah.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: You two dimensional dumb zombie...I think this is the guy you're looking for.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Hey there, zombie!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Oh! He's changed his appearance!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Oh my God! That' s the boy who invited me to the rap battle that time!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Actually, it was me in disguise who invited you to a rap battle that time!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: And the girl I was with was also a fake created with my abilities!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: !? What!? What do you mean!?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Let me introduce myself, my name is PRIS-ma, and I am a noble being from the third dimension.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: One day I had an idea for a pastime.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: The pastime I've come up with is to gather you two-dimensional denizens and savage rappers, and have you fight each other and watch the action.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: I was handing out flyers to all kinds of people to enjoy such a rap battle...
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: You!! You stupid zombie!!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: What? Me?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I was just trying to be nice and show you the way to the venue because I thought you were participating in a rap battle, and now you want to "eat the players"... What were you thinking, you idiot!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: You're ruining my fun! Thanks to you, I couldn't even slow down to watch the other guys' rap battle!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Ah...that's why you taught me the joy of rap battles in the first place.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...What? So, the competition that gives the winner the right to make one wish come true...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: No! It's just a ruse I created to lure the rappers in!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: What? Oh, that's too bad...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Totally... but your ugly rap battle was a sight to see.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Hey you silly triangular head.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Don't call me that!!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Wanna rap battle with me?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...What?
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: If you think about it, you're the one who reminded me how fun it is to sing.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: So in return, I'll give you a fun rap battle!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: It's more fun to do it together than to watch!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Hm, okay. I'll remind you of my dimensional difference!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Hehe, I won't lose!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily
